title: US Woman Sentenced to Life For Killing Sons By "Placing Them In Oven"
content: The incident dates back to 2017 when Ms Willimas called emergency services to report she had found her two sons dead in the home.

title: Runaway Dog Scrim Makes Another Dramatic Escape, Search Underway
content: Scrim, the scruffy white terrier mix who captured New Orleans' heart earlier this year with his escapades, is on the run again after a dramatic escape Friday morning.
summary: Scrim, the scruffy white terrier mix who captured New Orleans' heart earlier this year with his escapades, is on the run again after a dramatic escape Friday morning.

title: Australian Radio Host, Alan Jones, Arrested Over Alleged Sex Offences
content: Famed Australian broadcaster and former Wallabies coach Alan Jones was charged Monday with a string of alleged historical sex crimes, police said, after an investigation into the conservative radio shock jock.
summary: Famed Australian broadcaster and former Wallabies coach Alan Jones was charged Monday with a string of alleged historical sex crimes, police said, after an investigation into the conservative radio shock jock.

title: Animal Shelter In New Hampshire Faces Crisis After Man Surrenders 1,000 Mice
content: An animal shelter in New Hampshire is struggling to manage an unprecedented surge in mice after a man handed over what he initially claimed to be "150 mice" last week.
summary: An animal shelter in New Hampshire is struggling to manage an unprecedented surge in mice after a man handed over what he initially claimed to be "150 mice" last week.

title: Mentally Ill Man Charged With Murder Of Father at Luxury Irish Resort

title: Jake Paul Celebrates Victory Over Mike Tyson With Lavish Afterparty

title: Meet Denmark's Victoria Kjaer Theilvig, Crowned Miss Universe 2024
content: Victoria Theilvig is the first Danish woman to be crowned Miss Universe.

title: Reports Claim Iran Leader In Coma. His Office Shares Pic Of Meeting Envoy
content: Multiple media reports recently claimed that Iran's Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was in a coma and that he had nominated his son, Mojtaba Khamenei, as his successor.
summary: Multiple media reports recently claimed that Iran's Ayatollah Ali Khamenei was in a coma and that he had nominated his son, Mojtaba Khamenei, as his successor.

title: Days After "Make America Healthy Again" Vow, Trump, RFK Jr Eat McDonald's
content: US President-elect Donald Trump's pick for health secretary, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., has been pictured sharing a McDonald's meal with his future boss, days after they promised to "make America healthy again."
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump's pick for health secretary, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., has been pictured sharing a McDonald's meal with his future boss, days after they promised to "make America healthy again."

title: US Cop Kills 7 Dogs During Animal Welfare Check At Home, Arrested

title: UK Cops Launch Hunt For Indian-Origin Husband Of Woman Found Murdered In Car

title: Brendan Carr, Big Tech Critic, Is Trump's Pick For US Communications Agency
content: US President-elect Donald Trump tapped Republican Brendan Carr, a critic of big tech, to lead the Federal Communications Commission (FCC).
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump tapped Republican Brendan Carr, a critic of big tech, to lead the Federal Communications Commission (FCC).

title: Biden's Big Decision To Benefit Ukraine Months Before Trump Takeover
content: US President Joe Biden's administration has lifted restrictions that had blocked Ukraine from using US-provided weapons to strike deep into Russian territory.
summary: US President Joe Biden's administration has lifted restrictions that had blocked Ukraine from using US-provided weapons to strike deep into Russian territory.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Brazil To Attend G20 Summit After Nigeria Visit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Brazil on Monday on the second leg of his three-nation visit, during which he will attend the G20 Summit.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Brazil on Monday on the second leg of his three-nation visit, during which he will attend the G20 Summit.

title: "Will Ask India To Send Back Sheikh Hasina": Bangladesh's Muhammad Yunus
content: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus said on Sunday that the interim government will seek the extradition of deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina, who fled to India after the fall of her government following a mass protest movement in August.
summary: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus said on Sunday that the interim government will seek the extradition of deposed prime minister Sheikh Hasina, who fled to India after the fall of her government following a mass protest movement in August.

title: Ukraine Announces Power Restrictions After "Massive" Russian Attack
content: Ukraine said it would introduce nationwide emergency power restrictions Monday after a "massive" Russian attack further damaged its already fragile energy grid ahead of a much-feared winter, with 9 civilians also killed across the country on Sunday.
summary: Ukraine said it would introduce nationwide emergency power restrictions Monday after a "massive" Russian attack further damaged its already fragile energy grid ahead of a much-feared winter, with 9 civilians also killed across the country on Sunday.

title: Pregnant Pak Woman Killed, Chopped Into Pieces Over "Witchcraft" Suspicion
content: In a shocking incident, a pregnant woman was killed allegedly by her mother-in-law who along with her three accomplices chopped her body in dozens of pieces before dumping it in a drain in the Punjab province of Pakistan, police said on Sunday.
summary: In a shocking incident, a pregnant woman was killed allegedly by her mother-in-law who along with her three accomplices chopped her body in dozens of pieces before dumping it in a drain in the Punjab province of Pakistan, police said on Sunday.

title: Xi Vows To Work With Trump Administration As He Held Final Talks With Biden
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed on Saturday to work with the incoming US administration of Donald Trump as he held his final talks with outgoing President Joe Biden on conflicts from cyber crime to trade, Taiwan, the South China Sea and Russia.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed on Saturday to work with the incoming US administration of Donald Trump as he held his final talks with outgoing President Joe Biden on conflicts from cyber crime to trade, Taiwan, the South China Sea and Russia.

title: "Will Hold The Much-Anticipated Election Once...": Muhammad Yunus
content: Bangladesh's interim leader Muhammad Yunus begged the country's "patience" to prepare for much-awaited elections in a speech to the nation marking 100 days in power since a student-led revolution.
summary: Bangladesh's interim leader Muhammad Yunus begged the country's "patience" to prepare for much-awaited elections in a speech to the nation marking 100 days in power since a student-led revolution.

title: 2 Soldiers Killed In Israeli Attack, Says Lebanon Army
content: The Lebanese army said an Israeli attack on Sunday killed two soldiers, accusing Israel of directly targeting their position in south Lebanon where the Israeli military is fighting Hezbollah.
summary: The Lebanese army said an Israeli attack on Sunday killed two soldiers, accusing Israel of directly targeting their position in south Lebanon where the Israeli military is fighting Hezbollah.
